org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainer
Class CriteriaContainer<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.LazyQueryContainer
      org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainer.CriteriaContainer<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Entity class.
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.data.Buffered, com.vaadin.data.Container, com.vaadin.data.Container.Indexed, com.vaadin.data.Container.ItemSetChangeNotifier, com.vaadin.data.Container.Ordered, com.vaadin.data.Container.PropertySetChangeNotifier, com.vaadin.data.Container.Sortable, Serializable
public final class CriteriaContainer<T>
extends org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.LazyQueryContainer

CriteriaContainer enables using JPA 2.0 Criteria type-safe queries with lazy batch loading, filter, sort and buffered writes.

Author:
Jean-Fran√ßois Lamy

Constructor Detail

CriteriaContainer

public CriteriaContainer(CritQueryDefinition<T> cd,
                         CritQueryFactory<T> cf)
Standard constructor for type-safe queries. Note: contrary to standard LazyQueryContainer, the entityManager is specified on the Factory, to allow better reuse of CritQueryDefinition.

Parameters:
cd -
cf -

CriteriaContainer

public CriteriaContainer(javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager,
                         boolean applicationManagedTransactions,
                         Class<T> entityClass,
                         int batchSize,
                         Object[] nativeSortPropertyIds,
                         boolean[] nativeSortPropertyAscendingStates)
                  throws InstantiationException,
                         IllegalAccessException
Constructor for typical case where an entity is queried and sorted.

Parameters:
entityManager - The JPA EntityManager.
applicationManagedTransactions - True if application manages transactions instead of container.
entityClass - The entity class.
batchSize - The batch size.
nativeSortPropertyIds - Properties participating in the native sort.
nativeSortPropertyAscendingStates - List of property sort directions for the native sort.
Throws:
IllegalAccessException
InstantiationException
Method Detail

filter

public void filter(LinkedList<CritRestriction> restrictions)
Filters the container content by setting "where" criteria in the JPA Criteria.

Parameters:
restrictions - restrictions to set to JPA query or null to clear.

addEntity

public T addEntity()
Adds entity to the container as first item i.e. at index 0.

Returns:
the new constructed entity.

removeEntity

public T removeEntity(int index)
Removes given entity at given index and returns it.

Parameters:
index - Index of the entity to be removed.
Returns:
The removed entity.

getEntity

public T getEntity(int index)
Gets entity at given index.

Parameters:
index - The index of the entity.
Returns:
the entity.
